bibl.title: Leiffman v. Stein. Memo from Defendant
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: Columbus County or we any other offered capacity

That said on the 6th day of June 1880 I received a prayer to be warrant issued by Elisha P. Ferry Governor of Washington Territory dated the 27th day of May AD 1880 authorizing and empowering once John G Justice ay ent therein named to take one of Wallack and Transfer him to the line of said Territory at the expense of the State of Texas which said warrant jurisprove to be founded repore a requisition of the Governor of the State of Texas which said warrant is herewith included and made a part of this return
Territory of Washington County of Whitman } ss
R P Stein having duly sworn an oath says he is the Sheriff named in the foregoing return that he has n=searched the source and believe it to be true
